vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.22.3;
son of: Meshullam (H4918);
father of: Shaphan (H8227B)
§ Azaliah = "Jehovah (Yahweh) has reserved (set apart)"
the father of Shaphan the scribe
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Mesulam; padre de Safán, secretario, en tiempos del rey Josías
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞薩利 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "耶和華已保留"
書記沙番的父親
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚萨利 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "耶和华已保留"
书记沙番的父亲
